room_title: Escape room "The Study" by The Basement in Kansas City
room_description:
You've somehow foiled Edward Tandy and escaped The Basement in Chapter 1. In Chapter 2, things have changed and you're treading on turf that Edward never expected you to gain access to. You've made it into his Study. 

In The Study, you find yourself in the upper quarters of the Tandy family home. Edward is VERY unhappy you've invaded his personal space. He plans to make you pay dearly for this mistake. Find out more than you ever hoped about our matriarch-obsessed serial killer. With event and theatrical puzzles, you must step up your game to see the light of day ever again.
